short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find item in your Path of Exile account

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find item in your Path of Exile account(stash tab, character inventory, equipped item or even socketed gem)

you can find by 
- item name
- item property
- league name
- mtx name
